subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Brewers General Manager Doug Melvin said the team made a contract proposal to C. C. Sabathia over the weekend, but he was not willing to discuss terms of the offer or assess the team’s chances of keeping Sabathia.
snippet: Brewers General Manager Doug Melvin said the team made a contract proposal to C. C. Sabathia over the weekend, but he was not willing to discuss terms of the offer or assess the team’s chances of keeping Sabathia.
